name: Non-conformant cases
query:
SELECT
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE NOT (event_name MATCHES(^ 'Create Sales Order Item'
	~> 'Create Outbound Delivery Item'
	~> 'Post Goods Issue'
	~> 'Create Invoice Item'
	~> 'Clear Invoice')))
FROM "defaultview-545"
metric_vars:
{'conformance_condition': {'name': 'conformance_condition', 'description': 'Sequence of events that describes the "to-be" process, for example, using the MATCHES function syntax ^ 'Create Sales Order Item' ~> 'Create Outbound Delivery Item' ~> 'Clear Invoice' $', 'defaultValues': [{'defaultValue': "^ 'Create Sales Order Item'
	~> 'Create Outbound Delivery Item'
	~> 'Post Goods Issue'
	~> 'Create Invoice Item'
	~> 'Clear Invoice'", 'sourceSystems': ['SAP_ECC', 'SAP_S4HANA'], 'processTypes': ['ORDER_TO_CASH']}, {'defaultValue': "^ 'Create PR Item'
	~> 'Release PR Item'
	~> 'Create PO Item'
	~> 'Release PO'
	~> 'Create Goods Receipt'
	~> ('Record Invoice Receipt'|'Create FI Invoice')
	~> 'Clear Invoice'", 'sourceSystems': ['SAP_ECC', 'SAP_S4HANA'], 'processTypes': ['PROCURE_TO_PAY']}, {'defaultValue': "^ 'Create Invoice'
	~> 'Post Invoice'
	~> 'Clear Invoice'
	~> 'Due Date passed'", 'sourceSystems': ['SAP_ECC', 'SAP_S4HANA'], 'processTypes': ['INVOICE_TO_CASH']}, {'defaultValue': "^ 'Vendor Creates Invoice'\n\t~> 'Post Invoice'\n\t~> 'Clear Invoice'\n\t~> 'Due Date passed'", 'sourceSystems': ['SAP_ECC', 'SAP_S4HANA'], 'processTypes': ['INVOICE_TO_PAY']}, {'defaultValue': "^ 'Create PR Item'
	~> 'Create PO Item'
	~> 'Create Goods Receipt'
	~> 'Create Asset Item'
	~> 'Capitalize Asset Item''
	~> 'Create FI Invoice'", 'sourceSystems': ['SAP_ECC', 'SAP_S4HANA'], 'processTypes': ['ACQUIRE_TO_ONBOARD']}, {'defaultValue': "^ 'Create Inspection Lot'
	~> 'Begin Result Recording'
	~> 'Complete Result Recording'
	~> 'Create Usage Decision'~> ('Material Movement Free'|'Material Movement Restricted')", 'sourceSystems': ['SAP_ECC', 'SAP_S4HANA'], 'processTypes': ['INSPECT_TO_QUALITY']}, {'defaultValue': "^ 'Create Process Order'
	~> 'Released'
	~> 'Confirmed'
	~> 'Technically completed'", 'sourceSystems': ['SAP_ECC', 'SAP_S4HANA'], 'processTypes': ['MAKE_TO_STOCK']}, {'defaultValue': "^ 'Create Incident'
	~> ('Assign Incident to User'|'Assign Incident to Network Group'|'Assign Incident to Service Desk Group')
	~> 'Incident in Progress'
	~> 'Incident Resolved'
	~> 'Close Incident'", 'sourceSystems': ['SERVICENOW'], 'processTypes': ['INCIDENT_TO_RESOLUTION']}, {'defaultValue': "^ 'Create Lead'
	~> 'Assign Lead Owner'
	~> 'Create Opportunity'
	~> ('Update Opportunity Stage to: Closed Won'
		|'Update Opportunity Stage to: 06 Closed Won (Onboarding)'
		|'Update Opportunity Stage to: Closed Lost'
		|'Update Opportunity Stage to: Dead'
		|'Update Opportunity Stage to: Dead - No Opportunity'
		|'Update Opportunity Stage to: Dead - No Decision'
		|'Update Opportunity Stage to: Dead - Duplicate'
		|'Update Opportunity Stage to: 00 Dead - Lost')", 'sourceSystems': ['SALESFORCE'], 'processTypes': ['LEAD_TO_OPPORTUNITY', 'LEAD_TO_QUOTE']}, {'defaultValue': "^ 'Create Meter Reading Order'
	~> 'Obtain Meter Reading Data'
	~> 'Data Plausibility Check Passed'
	~> 'Create Billing Document'
	~> 'Create Invoice Document'
	~> 'Receive Incoming Payment'", 'sourceSystems': ['SAP_ISU'], 'processTypes': ['METER_TO_CASH']}, {'defaultValue': "^ 'Create Sales Order Item'
	~> 'Create LE Outbound Delivery Item'
	~> 'Create Outbound Delivery Order Item'
	~> 'Create Warehouse Task'
	~> 'Confirm Warehouse Task'
	~> 'Post Goods Issue'", 'sourceSystems': ['SAP_EWM'], 'processTypes': ['EWM_OUTBOUND']}], 'value': "^ 'Create Sales Order Item'
	~> 'Create Outbound Delivery Item'
	~> 'Post Goods Issue'
	~> 'Create Invoice Item'
	~> 'Clear Invoice'"}}
signalFragment:
SELECT COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE NOT (event_name MATCHES(${conformance_condition}))) FROM THIS_PROCESS
parser_values: ["defaultview-545", "Create Sales Order Item", "Create Outbound Delivery Item", "Clear Invoice", "Post Goods Issue", "Create Invoice Item"]
parser_error:
Required keyword: 'this' missing for <class 'sqlglot.expressions.BitwiseXor'>. Line 1, Col: 196.
  "Create Outbound Delivery Item"  ~> "Post Goods Issue"  ~> "Create Invoice Item"  ~> "Clear Invoice"[4m)[0m)) FROM "defaultview-545"
view_columns: Last Invoice Item Accrual Tax Amount
Last Invoice Item Expected Tax Amount
Last Invoice Ship From Location Id
Last PR Item Is Partial Flag
